Review title: Plot holes mania !! Unbelievable number of mistakes!!
Review_body:
The original plot of a dangerous game is *creepy,mysterious and sends chills down your spine*. Even several remakes have made this a great plot to make a movie on.Coming to the indian version , keeping aside Rhea blank face or her childish giggles or Emraan Hashmi never-ending saga of being the ladies man!!. I have nothing but disbelief that this masterpiece was ruined.Here are the silly plot holes....
Movie starts with Emraan driving somewhere in India with world class roads, where its snowing like crazy. It looks so unbelievable
The board that shows delhi is funny ...it says around 200 km in both directions...firstly there is no such place near delhi which snows this crazy and secondly, if it was just two hundred kms , it will be a tourist hotspot with loads of.traffic ...No phone coverage at 200 kms from delhi...you must be joking.It looks like NO's husband left her 5 Mn (which is just 30 crores) and Emraan demands a measely 3 crore ? (Duh !!). Being CEO of 30 crore company jist doesnt deserve this plot !!Emraan steals NO old. BMW X5 and forgets to take her GT which is worth way more (possibly thinking I need a family car)
Amitabh bachan entry is funny , he at begining says its a coat with fur and must be expensive...lol that is a funny argument. Then he says its Louis Vuitton. I really doubt anyone living in mountain with no access will know so.much about LV
The guy says we dont play Candy crush....wow thats a lot of info.for.guys who dont own a mobile...
There was a guy before who left his pant....it seems that he left the house and forgot to wear his pants ?The walls are full of paintings of justice...if rhea is the painter...why doesnt she talk anything about her art.The oldies say there were members of a nearby legal court house. If they were so.mentally unfit, wouldnt the courts spotted this behaviour. They would have passed past judgements of similar nature
Emraan gives rhea two butterflies which she promises.to keep till her end, then she dumps it.I see a scene where amitabh asks rhea brother to put a chair, and he by mistake lands up saying sure.If rhea brother is.guilty and was in jail, why would.they hire him...they never give.proper reply.Amitabh toward end calls the police and says something....the phoneline which was dead became.active.
This is a pure time waste performance bull crap. The story is pathetic, the drama is unbearable and the acting is bad.very very very bad I cannot imagine Bollywood is in such a poor state.

Most dumb movie in history. What a waste. Story is total ridiculous. They tried to make it a super good thriller. But the story is total nonsense.The film is very slow paced. It's becomes boring after sometime. At the end Amitabh solves speech was very lengthy and doesn't make sense. Rheas role is very limited and her acting is horrible. The vfx of snow fall is also horrible.

The movie made it obvious by making Amitabh Bachchan as the prosecutor, that Emraan will be punished and the case will be won by none other than Amitabh.Illegally spoofing password and attaining control over mobile without the consent. Long monologues on law and other stuffs.Pretty boring movie to watch, at the end you get nothing out of it.

Review title: You can not commit a crime to give justice.
Review_body:
I was really expecting a very intellectual role of Emran Hashmi but the character was straight opposite.Now If I talk about the emotion behind the story, that Zaidi and all were trying to punish the guilty who some how played safe in the real world.But in this process Zaidi n team were also commited a number of crimes like they misguided sameer to take the shorcut and then intentionally blocked the road by making a tree to fall, which may kill sameer, They hostiled Sameer without his permission, Manipulated him to play the game, breached his privacy just for a game, Tried to overpower him, forced him to drink alcohol even after he refused the offer.Conclusion:
Emotion was good.I cant comment on acting because all are legends.

The movie was altogether great! Watching two of the legends working together for the first time was really exciting for me. The director did a very good job at casting. The trailer itself deserves praise. The storyline was pretty interesting and thrilling too. I watched it with my family.

Had to simply skip the long monologue of his as it completely deviated from the main storyline. Climax was lame and unintelligent.

Emraan is an excellent performer, he just didn't get equal opportunities like others to show his rare talent. I request if anyone is reading this to support Emraan and let him show what he truly is.All the love Emraan sir

Review title: Glorification of any criminal is not acceptable
Review_body: Bollywood has found a very good method to glorify guilty persons that is just make completely biased film on the topic. The actors of this film who are saying what happened to Rhea is not acceptable , why their mouth was sealed when Sushant died ? Where were they at that time? Why they were silent when drugs scandal came out? Doesn't matter how good actor or big star you are if you are showing support to a criminal then you are also a criminal. These actors didn't say anything when a person died but now they have made made a film to glorify the prime suspect and that suspect was found guilty by NCB in the drugs case also. This film is a proof of bollywood's Hypocrisy.

Review title: great Worth watching everyone should give it a go.
